channel.title: Spoon feed. me. plox
channel.description:
pi source 317
How can i make it soo skillcapes u need 99 of that level to work.
i kinda know how but can some 1 explain it to me.
and can some 1 spoon feed me all the codes i need to add for each skillcape. except the new ones.. dung,summoning ect.

item.title: Spoon feed. me. plox
item.dc:creator: @cru012 cru012
item.description:
@cru012 wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:18, topic:370918”][quote author=Mariokillu link=topic=467009.msg3415034#msg3415034 date=1290981571]

stop quating my sentences geeez.

i goda snowboard tom all day want this done.

if u get tom as a guy that makes no sense…
that makes sens as in tom

and vain wat do i add to make one?

[size=12pt]Translation:[/size]
"Stop quoting my sentences, geez.

I have to snowboard all day tomorrow, I want this done.

Didn’t understand what he was trying to say here"
[/quote]

OH,
OK now it all makes sense,

Finally someone who can translate what you are saying into plain english.[/quote]
lol

Read full topic

item.title: Spoon feed. me. plox
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Somebody didn’ t read the rules before posting…

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Read full topic
